text: Armando Garrido dos Santos (born June 17, 1986 in Luís Domingues), known as Armando Maranhão or simply Armando, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Santos–AP as forward. He already played for national competitions such as Copa do Brasil and Campeonato Brasileiro Série D. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Conmebol !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |valign="center"|Ypiranga–AP |2013 |Série D |6||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||6||1 |- |valign="center"|Santos–AP |2016 |Série D |4||1||colspan="2"|—||2||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||6||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !10!!2!!colspan="2"|—!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!12!!2 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Santos Futebol Clube (AP) players
